pageContent: Purpose: To investigate focal therapy using High Intensity Focused Ultrasound (HIFU) for the treatment of localized prostate cancer (CaP), we analyzed the safety and complications of this procedure.

metaData.source:
The primary treatment of prostate cancer with high-intensity focused ultrasound: A systematic review and meta-analysis
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33031318/
